name: Issue
query:
select
    `tabIssue`.naming_series as "Ticket ID:Select/Series",
    `tabIssue`.customer as "Customer:Link/Customer",
    `tabIssue`.project as "Project:Link/Project",
    `tabIssue`.subject as "Subject:Data/Subject",
    `tabIssue`.description as "Description:Text Editor/Description",
    `tabIssue`.status as "Status:Select/Status",
    `tabIssue`.opening_date as "Opening Date:Date/Opening Date",
    `tabIssue`.resolution_date as "Resolution Date:Datetime/Resolution Date"
from `tabIssue`;
